name: Vegan Biscuits and Gravy
description: An easy vegan sausage gravy over southern-style flaky biscuits makes the BEST breakfast! You won't miss the meat or dairy with this tasty recipe, and it's ready in just 30 minutes.
recipeIngredient: 14 ounces vegan sausage crumbles, or chopped pieces (*I used Impossible brand, see Notes)
1 teaspoon salt, or more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan over medium-high heat, cook the vegan sausage.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large pan over medium-high heat, cook the vegan sausage.

recipeInstructions.text: Now add the flour, cashew milk and vegan butter. Cook on medium heat for 5-10 minutes, stirring constantly, until the gravy thickens.
recipeInstructions.name: Now add the flour, cashew milk and vegan butter. Cook on medium heat for 5-10 minutes, stirring constantly, until the gravy thickens.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the thyme, rosemary, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Taste the gravy and add any additional seasonings, salt or pepper, as desired.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the thyme, rosemary, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Taste the gravy and add any additional seasonings, salt or pepper, as desired.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve immediately over warm biscuits and enjoy!
